title: MainConcept TotalCode Studio 3.5.0 Retail (x64 only)
description:
Professional desktop encoding for digital distribution and over the top services

Information

Whether your content is consumed on tablets, smartphones, TVs or set-top boxes â€“ or delivered through different channels, such as broadcast, cable, satellite, the Internet or IPTV â€“ TotalCode Studio has you covered. TotalCode Studio can help post-production studios, small content preparation houses, broadcasters, and non-linear editors succeed with efficient workflows and stunning video quality.

A plug-in based application that incorporates MainConcept's codecs into a single desktop application, TotalCode Studio is practical, efficient and cost effective option for almost any professional market segment â€“ from content producers and consumer electronics manufacturers to broadcast and OTT content preparation. Due to its many ready-to-use presets and multi-purpose advanced encoder settings, TotalCode Studio enables you to convert your video and audio into numerous formats including some of the latest standards such as HEVC, Ultra HD 4K, MPEG-DASH, as well as popular mainstream distribution formats like HLS.

TotalCode Studio 3.5 also supports the following new features:

- TotalCode Studio allows import of HEVC 10-bit files in MPEG-2 TS and MP4, or as ES.
- Update to the latest HEVC Encoder and Decoder from HEVC SDK 5.0, including High Tier and BT.2020 support.
- Improved handling of input streams that contain variable frame rates, including A/V synchronization optimizations.
- TotalCode Studio can now import and create 8K RAW streams.
- Advanced Settings Dialog now available for DivX Plus format.

Many powerful features, such as watch folder automation, batch list encoding, audio and video filters â€“ color correction, timecode insertion, and audio normalization â€“ make TotalCode Studio an ideal tool for production environments requiring professional quality and performance.

Features

Support for Popular Delivery Formats
Export multiplexed files using a wide range of popular formats including AVC/H.264, QuickTime (for Apple iPad and iPhone), Adobe Flash, 3GP (H.263, H.264, MPEG-4), HTML5, DVB, and DivXÂ®.

Apple HLS and DASH-265 / DASH-264 Compliant File Creation
Create presets and encode MPEG-DASH compliant DASH-265 and DASH-265 files. Moreover, you can create Apple HLS compliant content.

HEVC (8-bit / 10-bit) and DivX HEVC
Encode HEVC/H.265 and DivX HEVC in various resolutions up to UltraHD (4K) and in real-time up to 1080p30. Now with ready-to-use HEVC Main 10 profiles, and MPEG TS output support.

Watch Folder Automation
Configure folders with predefined encoding parameters and leave TotalCode to automatically process incoming media whenever it is added.

Built-in Video and Audio Processing
Adjust source files with color correction, timecode insertion, audio normalization, video scaling, and frame and sample rate conversion.

Scalable Codec Support
Add more advanced video and audio codecs (e.g., JPEG2000, and DTSÂ®) as needed, through seamless upgrades that utilize the same familiar TotalCode Studio encoding interface.

Batch List Encoding
Execute multiple tasks efficiently by setting up a batch process for files that use specified encoding presets and output formats.

Built-in Video and Audio Processing
Adjust source files with color correction, timecode insertion, logo burn-in, image flipping, image cropping, audio normalization, video scaling, and frame and sample rate conversion.

TotalCode Preset Exchange
Create custom presets in TotalCode Studio and exchange presets between TotalCode Studio and TotalCode Enterprise.

Full 64-bit Support
TotalCode Studio is now a native 64-bit application, with improved 4K HEVC transcoding performance, and support for 10-bit ProRes source files, including ProRes 4:2:2 and 4:4:4.

Homepage http://www.mainconcept.com/eu/products/applications/vod-transcoding/totalcode-studio.html
